description: 6502 byte patterns that indicate code sequences. Trailing wildcards are omitted since the disassembler follows instruction flow automatically.

patterns.name: LDA immediate + STA absolute
patterns.description: LDA #$xx STA $xxxx - common value assignment

patterns.name: LDA immediate + STA zeropage
patterns.description: LDA #$xx STA $xx - zeropage value assignment

patterns.name: LDX immediate + STX absolute
patterns.description: LDX #$xx STX $xxxx - X register assignment

patterns.name: LDX immediate + STX zeropage
patterns.description: LDX #$xx STX $xx - X register zeropage assignment

patterns.name: LDY immediate + STY absolute
patterns.description: LDY #$xx STY $xxxx - Y register assignment

patterns.name: LDY immediate + STY zeropage
patterns.description: LDY #$xx STY $xx - Y register zeropage assignment

patterns.name: JSR + RTS
patterns.description: JSR $xxxx RTS - subroutine call followed by return

patterns.name: SEI + LDA
patterns.description: SEI LDA #$xx - disable interrupts then load (common init)

patterns.name: LDA absolute + CMP immediate
patterns.description: LDA $xxxx CMP #$xx - load and compare pattern

patterns.name: LDA zeropage + CMP immediate
patterns.description: LDA $xx CMP #$xx - zeropage load and compare

patterns.name: INC absolute + BNE
patterns.description: INC $xxxx BNE - increment and branch loop

patterns.name: DEC absolute + BNE
patterns.description: DEC $xxxx BNE - decrement and branch loop

patterns.name: INX + CPX + BNE
patterns.description: INX CPX #$xx BNE - X register loop

patterns.name: INY + CPY + BNE
patterns.description: INY CPY #$xx BNE - Y register loop

patterns.name: DEX + BNE
patterns.description: DEX BNE - X decrement loop

patterns.name: DEY + BNE
patterns.description: DEY BNE - Y decrement loop

patterns.name: PHA + TXA
patterns.description: PHA TXA - push A, transfer X to A

patterns.name: PHA + TYA
patterns.description: PHA TYA - push A, transfer Y to A

patterns.name: PLA + RTS
patterns.description: PLA RTS - restore A and return

patterns.name: LDA indirect Y + STA indirect Y
patterns.description: LDA ($xx),Y STA ($xx),Y - indirect indexed copy

patterns.name: CLC + ADC immediate
patterns.description: CLC ADC #$xx - clear carry then add

patterns.name: SEC + SBC immediate
patterns.description: SEC SBC #$xx - set carry then subtract

patterns.name: LDA + AND + STA zeropage
patterns.description: LDA #$xx AND #$xx STA $xx - mask and store pattern

patterns.name: LDA + ORA + STA zeropage
patterns.description: LDA #$xx ORA #$xx STA $xx - or and store pattern

patterns.name: STA $d020
patterns.description: Border color $d020

patterns.name: STA $d021
patterns.description: BG color $d020
